info.name: Nginx version detect
author: philippedelteil
daffainfo
info.description: Some nginx servers have the version on the response header. Useful when you need to find specific CVEs on your targets.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: api.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

Host: api.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

Host: api.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close

Accept-Language: en

Host: api.gouv.fr

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 30357
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;api.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 30357
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;api.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
api.gouv.fr.	600	IN	NS	ns18.ovh.net.
api.gouv.fr.	600	IN	NS	dns18.ovh.net.

request:
OPTIONS / HTTP/1.1
Host: api.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

GET /robots.txt HTTP/1.1
Host: api.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Content-Length: 14
Accept-Ranges: bytes
Cache-Control: public, max-age=0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8
Date: Sun, 29 May 2022 02:12:13 GMT
Etag: W/"e-180fbdb84a1"
Last-Modified: Wed, 25 May 2022 15:35:09 GMT
Server: nginx/1.18.0 (Ubuntu)
Vary: Accept-Encoding

User-agent: *

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 46628
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;api.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 46628
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 3, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;api.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
api.gouv.fr.	600	IN	MX	100 mxb.ovh.net.
api.gouv.fr.	600	IN	MX	5 mx2.ovh.net.
api.gouv.fr.	600	IN	MX	1 mx1.ovh.net.

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: api.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: api.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://api.gouv.fr/'

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 31139
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;api.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 31139
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 6, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;api.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
api.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=mtU0zHGIV-mwFoyp1bM0f67XKGJEQOxlfM5t1BTTeHA"
api.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"1|www.api.gouv.fr"
api.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"Sendinblue-code:2338554a9d09e27cb9014c7b56690dca"
api.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=ld_Y4E2WCMYwp-QQ5qDQLWzxQO7YKsEeHtTe8aScRcE"
api.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 mx include:spf.sendinblue.com include:spf.mailjet.com include:mx.ovh.com ~all"
api.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=6LnXgjWSo1BZA0bGwIpPwxkv6wJXlav37nt5OuBlu4c"
